description: old building in ruins; plants growing at tops; figures of people in center foreground; walking figure right foregrond inside ruins through arch; four figures left foreground; two figures on second level of ruins; letters on or above various parts of building
inscription:
Inscription

in plate in black: [Tav IV/ DEL CASTELLO DELL\' AQUA GIULIA/ Piranesi F.]; various capital letters of the alphabet in image in black
portfolio: From Plate IV from "Le Rovine del Castello dell' Acqua Giulia"
title: Del Castello Dell' Acqua Giulia
